name: Asylum - 10 (Ten) - 70X7
additionalNotes: The line started back in 2019 celebrating the brand’s 10th anniversary with the Seven and was a Nicaraguan wrapper over Honduran tobacco, then the following two years each being Honduran puros. An expertly crafted perfecto that delivers notes of spice, pepper, earth and cinnamon. This medium-strength stick sports a Nicaraguan maduro wrapper and a Honduran binder and filler. Handmade in Honduras, the Asylum Ten Limited Edition 11/18 celebrates this iconic brand’s tenth anniversary. Once rolled, each cigar is placed in a wooden coffin to protect its wrapper and preserve its flavor.
